rooms.description: Open area near the entrance to greet guests; designed with sustainable materials and energy efficient lighting.
Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light, oriented towards the northeast as per Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the living room; featuring an open plan layout and sustainable furniture.
Functional kitchen with energy efficient appliances and natural lighting.
Private bathroom attached to the living area for convenience; designed with eco-friendly fixtures.

openings.description: Spacious balcony attached to the bedroom, with floor-to-ceiling windows.
